index.html.title: Chartboost Core Unity SDK | Chartboost Core Unity SDK
index.html.keywords: Chartboost Core Unity SDK Minimum Requirements Plugin Version Chartboost Core SDK 0.0.0+ Cocoapods 1.11.3+ iOS 11.0+ Xcode 14.1+ Android API 21+ Unity 2020.3.37f+ Integration Chartboost Core Unity SDK is distributed using the public npm registry as such it is compatible with the Unity Package Manager (UPM). In order to add the Chartboost Core Unity SDK to your project, just add the following to your Unity Project's manifest.json file. The scoped registry section is required in order to fetch packages from the NpmJS registry. "dependencies": { "com.chartboost.core": "0.2.0", ... }, "scopedRegistries": [ { "name": "NpmJS", "url": "https://registry.npmjs.org", "scopes": [ "com.chartboost" ] } ] Contributions We are committed to a fully transparent development process and highly appreciate any contributions. Our team regularly monitors and investigates all submissions for the inclusion in our official adapter releases. Refer to our CONTRIBUTING file for more information on how to contribute. License Refer to our LICENSE file for more information.
